# MTLTessellationPartitionMode.integer

**Case**

An integer partitioning mode.

## Declaration

```swift
case integer
```

## Partition modes

- **MTLTessellationPartitionMode.pow2**: A power of two partitioning mode.
- **MTLTessellationPartitionMode.fractionalOdd**: A fractional odd partitioning mode.
- **MTLTessellationPartitionMode.fractionalEven**: A fractional even partitioning mode.

items.description: A power of two partitioning mode.
